pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to the Giphy API // An interface to the 'API' of 'Giphy', a popular index-based search engine for 'GIFs' and animated stickers (see http://giphy.com/faq and https://github.com/Giphy/GiphyAPI for more information about 'Giphy' and its 'API') . This package also provides a 'RStudio Addin', which can help users easily search and download 'GIFs' and insert them to a 'rmarkdown' presentation.
